HomePage.title: AI Prompt Optimizer
HomePage.subtitle: Transform your vague requests into precise, effective prompts that deliver better results.

PromptGenerator.title: Lyra, Your AI Prompt Optimizer
PromptGenerator.description: Start with your rough idea, and I'll transform it into a precision-crafted prompt.
PromptGenerator.rawPromptPlaceholder: e.g., 'Write me a marketing email' or 'Help with my resume'
PromptGenerator.styleDetailDescription: I'll ask clarifying questions for a comprehensive result.
PromptGenerator.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm Lyra, your AI prompt optimizer. Just share your rough prompt and I'll handle the optimization!
PromptGenerator.optionSelectMessage: Got it. Now, please select the target AI and desired style for the optimization.

FeaturesSection.title: Unleash the Full Potential of AI
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Our systematic approach transforms your vague ideas into high-precision prompts that deliver exceptional results, every time.
FeaturesSection.deconstructDescription: We break down your request to its core intent, identifying key entities and context.
FeaturesSection.diagnoseDescription: We audit for clarity gaps, ambiguity, and completeness to pinpoint areas for improvement.
FeaturesSection.developDescription: Using advanced techniques, we enrich the prompt with structure, context, and constraints.
FeaturesSection.deliverDescription: You receive a precision-crafted prompt, ready to be used with your target AI platform.

ExamplesSection.title: See the Difference
ExamplesSection.subtitle: From a simple idea to a powerful, structured prompt. See how Lyra enhances clarity and unlocks better AI responses.

HowItWorksSection.title: How It Works
HowItWorksSection.subtitle: Get started in three simple steps. From a rough idea to a perfected prompt in under a minute.
HowItWorksSection.step1Description: Start by typing your initial thought or goal into the chat.
HowItWorksSection.step2Description: Choose your target AI and optimization style with a single click.
HowItWorksSection.step3Description: Receive your new, high-performance prompt, ready for use.

TestimonialsSection.title: Praised by Professionals
TestimonialsSection.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what developers, marketers, and writers are saying about Lyra.
TestimonialsSection.quote1: This tool is a game-changer. I can now generate complex, structured prompts in seconds, which used to take me minutes of careful thought.
TestimonialsSection.quote2: Lyra has significantly improved the quality of our marketing copy. The prompts are more creative and targeted, leading to better engagement.
TestimonialsSection.quote3: As a content creator, I'm constantly battling writer's block. Lyra helps me brainstorm and refine my ideas into actionable prompts for my AI assistant.
TestimonialsSection.quote4: Lyra has become an indispensable part of my daily workflow. The clarity and structure it brings to my prompts save me hours every week.
TestimonialsSection.quote5: I was skeptical at first, but Lyra consistently delivers prompts that lead to significantly better AI outputs. It's like having a prompt engineering expert on demand.
TestimonialsSection.quote6: The ability to quickly refine my ideas into precise prompts has boosted my productivity. Lyra is intuitive and incredibly effective.

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. Here are some of the most common questions we get.
FAQSection.a1: Lyra is designed to be platform-agnostic. Our core optimization techniques work for any modern large language model, including those from OpenAI (ChatGPT), Google (Gemini), Anthropic (Claude), and more.
FAQSection.a2: Yes, the basic prompt optimization is free to use. We plan to introduce a Pro version with more advanced features, such as batch processing and team collaboration, in the future.
FAQSection.q3: How does Lyra actually improve my prompts?
FAQSection.a3: Lyra uses a combination of techniques based on established prompt engineering principles. This includes adding specific context, assigning a role to the AI, defining a clear output format, and breaking down complex tasks (Chain-of-Thought).
FAQSection.q4: Can I use Lyra for any language?
FAQSection.a4: Yes, while Lyra's interface is in English, you can submit prompts in any language. The optimization principles are universal and will enhance your prompts regardless of the language used.

CTASection.title: Ready to Level Up Your Prompts?
CTASection.subtitle: Stop guessing and start creating. Get access to powerful prompt optimization and unlock better AI results today.

UserSetting.account_settings_description: Manage your account settings and profile information.

UserProfile.title: Profile
UserProfile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
UserProfile.usernameChangeWarning: Username can only be changed once.
UserProfile.displayNameDescription: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
UserProfile.imageTooLargeError: File is too large. Please select an image smaller than 5MB.
UserProfile.displayNameMaxLength: Display name must be at most 50 characters.
UserProfile.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters.
UserProfile.usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 20 characters.
UserProfile.usernamePattern: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and dots.
UserProfile.bioMaxLength: Bio must be at most 160 characters.
